description:
net/url: Correctly escape URL as per RFC 3986

The shouldEscape function did not correctly escape the reserved characters listed in RFC 3986 §2.2, breaking some strict web servers.
Fixes issue 3433.

messages.text:
Hello rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

On 2012/04/02 16:02:53, rsc wrote:
> Please add tests for the other characters.
> More changed than just '!'.
> 
> http://codereview.appspot.com/5970050/diff/3001/src/pkg/net/url/url.go
> File src/pkg/net/url/url.go (right):
> 
> http://codereview.appspot.com/5970050/diff/3001/src/pkg/net/url/url.go#newcode64
> src/pkg/net/url/url.go:64: // appearing in a URL string, according to RFC 2396
> and RFC 3986.
> s/RFC 2396 and //
> 
> RFC 2396 is dead, according to http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc2396

PTAL, I have uploaded a new patch set with the suggested changes.

Please add tests for the other characters.
More changed than just '!'.

http://codereview.appspot.com/5970050/diff/3001/src/pkg/net/url/url.go
File src/pkg/net/url/url.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5970050/diff/3001/src/pkg/net/url/url.go#newcode64
src/pkg/net/url/url.go:64: // appearing in a URL string, according to RFC 2396 and RFC 3986.
s/RFC 2396 and //

RFC 2396 is dead, according to http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc2396

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

It looks like you have not completed a CLA,
so I can't submit this yet.

Please complete a CLA as described at
http://golang.org/doc/contribute.html#copyright

Thanks.
Russ

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=6b46fb967ca4 ***

net/url: Correctly escape URL as per RFC 3986

The shouldEscape function did not correctly escape the reserved characters listed in RFC 3986 §2.2, breaking some strict web servers.
Fixes issue 3433.

R=rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5970050

Committer: Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org>

Done.

Thank you for accepting the patch.

On 2012/04/05 15:17:16, rsc wrote:
> It looks like you have not completed a CLA,
> so I can't submit this yet.
> 
> Please complete a CLA as described at

subject: code review 5970050: net/url: Correctly escape URL as per RFC 3986
